overview: Mr. Coyne has represented both landlords and tenants in an assortment of retail, industrial, office, and residential leasing matters. He has also represented clients in the acquisition of a wide range of commercial real estate properties and businesses (including national franchises, bars and restaurants, and professional practices). Through his family practice, Mr. Coyne has represented many executors and trustees in the administration of probate and trust estates in both Chicago and the collar counties. He also acts as “Of Counsel” to the Oakbrook Terrace, IL law firm Bishop, Rossi & LaForte, LLC.
